# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(input_string::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input_string)
    current_line_length = 0
    wrapped_string = ""
    
    for word in words
        if current_line_length + length(word) > text_width
            wrapped_string *= "\n"
            current_line_length = 0
        end
        wrapped_string *= "$word "
        current_line_length += length(word) + 1
    end
    
    return wrapped_string
end

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")
```
